thread.title: Toronto police eye deadly van attack suspect's 'cryptic message'

title: Toronto police eye deadly van attack suspect's 'cryptic message'
text:
Toronto police eye deadly van attack suspect's 'cryptic message' 2:53am IST - 01:07 
The man accused of plowing a rental van into pedestrians on a crowded Toronto sidewalk, killing 10 people in Canada's deadliest mass killing in decades left a ''cryptic message'' on social media before his attack, Toronto Police Detective Sergeant Graham Gibson said on Tuesday.   
The man accused of plowing a rental van into pedestrians on a crowded Toronto sidewalk, killing 10 people in Canada's deadliest mass killing in decades left a "cryptic message" on social media before his attack, Toronto Police Detective Sergeant Graham Gibson said on Tuesday.  //reut.rs/2HZoOnC
